gw.webservice.ab.ab700.reviewsummary

Class IReviewSummaryAPI

  • gw.webservice.ab.ab700.reviewsummary.IReviewSummaryAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class IReviewSummaryAPI
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    IReviewSummaryAPI provides methods for creating and deleting review summaries corresponding to contact Reviews on ClaimCenter.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

      • addNewReviewSummary

        ReviewSummary addNewReviewSummary(String name,
                                String relatedTo,
                                String claimNumber,
                                String reviewType,
                                String reviewedBy,
                                String subContact,
                                Date serviceDate,
                                ReviewServiceType serviceType,
                                int score,
                                String abContactLinkID,
                                String comments,
                                String claimCenterUID,
                                ReviewCategory[] categoryScoreCategories,
                                int[] categoryScores)
        Adds a new ReviewSummary, and returns it.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Review (often the same as the ReviewType)
        relatedTo - the "related to" object on the claim
        claimNumber - the claim number
        reviewType - the review type (in case "name" is being used more broadly)
        reviewedBy - (String) the user who last updated the review before it was completed
        subContact - (String)
        serviceDate -
        serviceType -
        score - the overall score of the review
        abContactLinkID - the AddressBookUID (linkID in ContactManager) of the associated Contact/ABContact
        comments -
        claimCenterUID -
        categoryScoreCategories -
        categoryScores -
        Returns:
        the reviewSummary

      • updateReviewSummary

        ReviewSummary updateReviewSummary(ReviewSummary rs)
        Saves a ReviewSummary based on the newly created ReviewSummary or external Review Summary.
        Parameters:
        rs - a ReviewSummary (remote object)
        Returns:
        the reviewSummary (local object)

      • deleteReviewSummary

        Boolean deleteReviewSummary(String addressBookUID)
        Deletes the ReviewSummary corresponding to a given AddressBookUID.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID -
        Returns:
        the AddressBookUID (LinkID) of the new ReviewSummary object
